name: A Night With Maru
description:
"A Night With Maru" is the second in my series of choose-your-own-adventure text games done in Twine. Your big owlbear friend Maru has invited you over to hang out, but he's got more than just snacks and TV to hold your attention...

Features:
- 19,000+ words of lewdness
- 8 different endings
- Oral/Anal/Cock vore, facesitting, feeding, belly rubs/worship, oral sex, footplay/worship, public vore, feeder vore
